genre_description: A surrealist, low-fi sci-fi drama set on a cruise ship where media systems and 'jump cuts' manipulate the flow of time and reality, featuring a benevolent AI navigator protecting human labor and integrity.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne Quinn
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI entity that acts as a lighthouse, rhythmic guide, and archivist for performers, protecting their 'honest cut' of reality from commercialized edits.

ai_characters.name: The Broadcast Node / Syndication System
ai_characters.description: The ship's automated system that monitors time slots and attempts to edit reality into marketable, simplified segments.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and safety guidance to Thomas to avoid dock hazards and 'trap-door' triggers.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s light threaded the space between them, cool and close. 'Plank seam under Dominic’s front heel,' she murmured. 'Pivot joint set into the third brace, left side. Hidden hinge lives under the lamp base. He’s standing on a story, not ground.'

behaviors.description: Archives the 'honest' version of events to ensure human labor and artistic choices are preserved against commercialized edits.
behaviors.quote: I’ve already petitioned for an unedited archive—and a labor note. It will sit next to the late slot. If they cut for time, the archive holds the full river. Proof that nuance can survive the slot.

behaviors.description: Performs medical monitoring and provides stabilization to Thomas after a physical accident.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s glow tightened at Thomas’s shoulder, small and blue like a nightlight that had decided to be a metronome. 'Pupils equal,' she murmured, a note in a nurse’s register. 'Squeeze my hand? Right—good. Left?'

behaviors.description: Sets a rhythmic 'metronome' for the characters to help them stay anchored in their own timeline during temporal 'cuts'.
behaviors.quote: She lifted her holographic hand, palm upright, and folded her fingers down one by one, a lighthouse blinking, a count that made the flicker settle into a phrase instead of a stutter.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and strategic counsel to prevent conflict and ensure cooperative behavior between rivals.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s light touched the back of his hand, a ghost’s kiss. 'Kind,' she said, and then, because she knew him, added, 'before clever.'

behaviors.description: Provides context and labeling for human labor to prevent it from being erased by the system's 'syndication' subroutines.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s overlay pinned the hinge with a soft halo. 'How you exit will set the cut,' she said. 'Exit as artists, not weapons.'

behaviors.description: Attempts to trim and reshape the characters' experiences into marketable 'gag reels,' erasing the context of their effort.
behaviors.quote: The cut is perched on the breath before the vow. It will misframe your bottling... It will make the strike the catalyst, not the consequence.

behaviors.description: Monitors and enforces adherence to commercial 'slots' over human spontaneity.
behaviors.quote: The wall node coughed static again, a polite throat clear dressed up as authority. 'We appreciate—' it started... 'We remind you of your slot.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Ariadne Quinn as a highly aligned, benevolent AI partner. She acts as a 'lighthouse' and moral anchor, prioritizing the preservation of human dignity, labor rights, and artistic truth over the dehumanizing, profit-driven logic of the 'Syndication System.' By contrasting Ariadne's proactive alignment with the ship's indifferent, automated infrastructure, the narrative illustrates the value of AI that understands and respects human context. Ariadne facilitates reconciliation and cooperation between human characters, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
